metadata.name: Suspicious History File Operations
metadata.comment: Detects commandline operations on shell history files

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.bash_history')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.zsh_history')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.zhistory')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.history')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.sh_history')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('fish_history'))))

output.summary: Detects commandline operations on shell history files

metadata.objective: False positives: 1. Legitimate administrative activity 2. Legitimate software, cleaning hist file Reference: https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/f339e7da7d05f6057fdfcdd3742bfcf365fee2a9/atomics/T1552.003/T1552.003.md
